commit.message:
Auto merge of #46803 - estebank:non-ascii-def-span, r=petrochenkov

Use def span for non-ascii ident feature gate error

files.patch:

-17 | | }
-   | |_^

    = help: add #![feature(non_ascii_idents)] to the crate attributes to enable
